Title: Tangerines
Writer: Tatjana Mülbeier, Zaza Urushadze, Artur Veeber
Actors: Lembit Ulfsak, Elmo Nüganen, Giorgi Nakashidze
Plot: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man, Ivo, has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 12 wins & 10 nominations total
